channel.title: QuickTip on Out Of Order Band
channel.description: Recent content in QuickTip on Out Of Order Band

item.title: How to get the latest student photo from iSAMS
item.description: It’s been eight months since my last blog post, having taken on a new job, been on the receiving end of a full-on enterprise ransomware attack (that wasn’t nice!) and quite frankly experiencing one heck of a baptism of fire - I felt it was time do write a quick blog post tip! In my new role, I haven’t had a lot of time or indeed need, to write many database queries.

item.title: Honeypots to catch prying eyes!
item.description: As I have mentioned in previous blog posts, I regularly listen to numerous technical podcasts. A relatively new edition to my listening collection is the information security podcast Risky Business – it’s great! On a recent episode, the company thinkst, were discussing a project they have been working on, to do with Honeypots. Not only are these Honeypots an extremely funky security layer, they are also free (at the time of posting).
